term_length.description: Flag NDAs with term exceeding 5 years or stated as perpetual

non_compete.description: Flag any non-compete or non-solicitation clause

ip_assignment.description: Flag if IP assignment extends beyond confidential information scope

jurisdiction.description: Flag if governing law is not England & Wales

nda_type.description: Note whether NDA is mutual or unilateral

remedies.description: Flag injunctive relief clauses that bypass court order requirements

broad_indicators: including but not limited to all

survival_clause.description: Flag survival obligations exceeding 3 years post-termination

high.description: 4+ flags or any critical flag, legal review strongly advised
